explanation: The original code incorrectly handles the case when n is a multiple of 5. The logic should return n itself when n is a multiple of 5 instead of rounding it up to n + 5. I fixed this by updating the condition to return n directly when n is divisible by 5.
fixed_code:
n=int(input())
print((n//5)*5+5 if n%5>=2 and n%5!=0 else (n//5)*5)
